name: EKCalendar
desc: A class that represents a calendar in EventKit.

items.name: init(for: EKEntityType, eventStore: EKEventStore)
items.desc: Creates a new calendar that can contain the given entity type.

items.name: struct EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: A bitmask indicating the event availability settings that the calendar can support.

items.name: var allowsContentModifications: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether you can add, edit, and delete items in the calendar.

items.name: var isImmutable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the calendar’s properties can be edited or deleted.

items.name: var allowedEntityTypes: EKEntityMask
items.desc: The entity types this calendar can contain.

items.name: var source: EKSource!
items.desc: The source object representing the account to which this calendar belongs.

items.name: var isSubscribed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the calendar is a subscribed calendar.

items.name: var supportedEventAvailabilities: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: The event availability settings supported by this calendar, as indicated by a bitmask.

items.name: var calendarIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique identifier for the calendar.
